reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: Empowernment of WWD in Tajikistan (Ishtirok). WHAT: The project promotes awareness about the rights of persons with disabilities and it supports disabled women in Tajikistan to become organized.WHY: Disabled women and specifically visibly disabled women ar e rarely encouraged to attend school and they often end up in a poverty trap. Low self-esteem prevents disabled women from actively pursuing the materializing of their rights.HOW: Peer support and different kinds of trainings help women to realize their ab ilities and rights and they can advocate for themselves. The project benefits local women to have the courage to apply for education and support themselves.PARTNER ORGANISATION: The project is implemented by Ishtirok, the biggest organization for disabled women in Tajikistan.
